name: Skate
description: Skate is a multi-VM infrastructure project that lets any decentralized application run seamlessly across multiple blockchainsâ€”both EVM and alternative VMs. It also provides native access to VM-specific applications on other chains, so EVM apps can operate directly within SVM or MOVE environments . Skate's core product is the Skate AMM, enabling a multi-VM, single-liquidity-curve across all chains.
